title: changelog for 0.12 release
body:
I've pushed the first batch of changelog entries for changes on the master branch (dbb6d3ab3).  I'm opening this issue as an alternative to the "changelog up-to-date" note we have in the [0.12.0 release project][0] so that I can attach the set of changes that I considered.

See the entries that start with `?` for changes that I didn't process one way or the other.  These are mostly windows-related changes.  Any help with these would be appreciated.  I don't plan to revisit them.

In addition to these, the `uninstall` changes (gh-3741) also lack an entry because it's not clear what will come of gh-3759.

[0]: https://github.com/datalad/datalad/projects/10
